item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】MP3 - Brit Smith - Karma's A Bitch (Original Version of JoJo Siwa's "Karma")
item.description:
Brittany Smith is an American singer, songwriter, actress and model. As of 2011, she performs under the name Matisse.

In 2012, Smith recorded "Karma's a Bitch," a song written by production team Rock Mafia (Antonina Armato & Tim James) and Miley Cyrus, with additional production from Timbaland. A music video was also produced. For reasons unknown, both projects were shelved.

Cyrus allegedly also recorded the song for an unknown project in 2010. Her version remains unreleased. In 2024, former Nickelodeon star JoJo Siwa recorded and released a slightly edited version of the song, now known as "Karma."





Album art by yours truly.

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: JayFantasi
